name: The Leech
description:
Earth 21XX. Post Nuked America, you are one of the Boyle Boys, the wealthiest family in America, and are tired of your reality show life. After your plane is shot down, you are forced into a new kind of reality show, where you must fight bloodthirsty competitors to survive. To fight, you must get within a certain distance, but not too close, to your enemies.

The window on HTML isn't working (which it won't be for the Jam) but the EXE is working perfectly: download the .exe in the files below! For Windows only.

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare competition by Peter Sheehan in Gamemaker Studio.

Source Files below.
